name: Swaniga: The Boardgame
description: Play as one of the historical dynasties trying to rule the fertile valley of Nepa Mandala by building Bazaars, creating thriving villages called Pringa, and consecrating deities in the Dega. But you are not the only one. Other rival factions are also preparing to do the same. The race to build the next ruling dynasty of the Swaniga is on! Are you ready to expand your dynasty, and leave a lasting impact on history!
